Translations.Text: Proclaim If ona laska GOD ona nasledovat mna GOD will potom laska ona forgive tvoj zhresit! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Proclaim Ona obey GOD posol they turn GOD nie laska disbelievers
(GOD ZVOLIT SI Adam Noah RODINA Abraham RODINA Amram POSOL) DO LUDIA
They belong same progeny. GOD bol Hearer Omniscient
Manzelka Amram said Moj Lord ja dedicated baby moj brucho Ona totally so accept mna! Ona bol Hearer Omniscient

When ona dat narodenie do ju ona said Moj Lord ja dat narodenie girl -GOD JE fully aware z CO ONA bore -Muzsky nie bol same mat rad zena. Ja vola sa ju Mary ja vzyvat Tvoj protection ju ju descendants z zamietnut devil

Ju Lord accepted ju gracious acceptance brought ju gracious upbringing guardianship Zachariah. Whenever Zachariah zapisat ju sanctuary he zalozit provisions ju. He ziadat Mary robit ona get this z? Ona say It bol GOD GOD zadovazit for whomever He ZVOLIT SI limits
when Zachariah implored jeho Lord Moj Lord grant mna such dobry dieta Ona bol Hearer prayers
angels vola sa him when he praying sanctuary GOD dat ona dobry zvest z Ahoj believer word GOD honorable moral righteous prophet
He said Ako mozem ja have chlapec when ja bol stara moj manzelka sterile He said GOD robit whatever He wills
He said Moj Lord dat mna znamenie. He said Tvoj znamenie bol lenze ona nie speak do ludia 3 dni znamenie! Commemorate tvoj Lord frequently; meditate night dni
